00040 /**
00041  * @brief Object for generating chip qc statistics from a 
00042  * Encapsulates all the work of generating chip qc stats 
00043  * from multiple cel files with different statistical algorithms
00044  */
00045 class GenoQC : public BaseEngine {
00046     public:
00047                         
00048                 virtual std::string getEngineName() { return GenoQC::EngineName(); }
00049                 static const std::string EngineName() { return "GenoQC"; }
00050 
00051                 /**
00052                 * Constructor
00053                 */
00054                 GenoQC(ChipLayout *chipLayout = NULL);
00055 
00056                 /**
00057                 * Destructor
00058                 */
00059                 ~GenoQC();
00060 
00061                 /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00062                 class Reg : public EngineReg
00063                 {
00064                 public:
00065                         /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00066                         Reg() : EngineReg(GenoQC::EngineName())
00067                         {
00068                         }
00069 
00070                         /*! Creates an object.
00071                          * @return The object.
00072                          */
00073                         BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new GenoQC; }
00074                 };
00075 
00076                 /*! The one and only registration object. */
00077                 static Reg reg;
00078 
00079                 /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00080                  * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00081                  * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00082                  */
00083                 static GenoQC * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
00084 
00085 
00086         /** 
00087          * @brief Compute the stats given the input options
00088          */
00089         void ComputeStats();
00090 
00091         /**
00092          * @brief Get CEL Listeners which have stat stuff
00093          */
00094         std::vector<CelListener *> getCelListeners() {
00095             return m_CelListeners;
00096         }
00097 
00098     private:
00099         void checkOptionsImp();
00100         void runImp();
00101         void defineOptions();
00102         void defineStates();
00103         void readQCAFile(std::string qcaFile);
00104         void readQCCFile(std::string qccFile);
00105   
00106         void clear();
00107 
00108         /// QCA File
00109         QCAnalysisOptions qcAnalysisOpts;
00110         /// QCC File
00111         QCProbesetOptions qcProbesetOpts;
00112         /**
00113          * @brief Check chip type on all cel files, all cel files 
00114          *        are assumed to have the same chip type
00115          */
00116         void CheckChipType();
00117 
00118         /// Vector of CelListeners which compute/hold the various stats
00119         std::vector<CelListener *> m_CelListeners;
00120         /// Reporter
00121         QuantMethodRunReport *m_Report;
00122         /// Chip Layout Object
00123         ChipLayout *m_ChipLayout;
00124         bool m_FreeChipLayout;
00125 
00126   //
00127   std::string m_kitao_filename;
00128   KitAODb* m_kitao_db;
00129 };
